Name: Strawbit
SeedDescription: Plant these in winter. Takes 5 days to mature. Produces baby strawberries every day.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en invierno. Tarda 5 días en madurar. Produce fresines todos los días.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no inverno. Demora 5 dias para crescer. Produz morangos bebés todos os dias.
